fields.name: Apple Pie
fields.description: Delight on this delicious and classic flavour, with notes of cinnamon, a creamy ganache and a crunchy base.
fields.mini_description: With notes of cinnamon, a creamy ganache and a crunchy base.

fields.name: Baileys and Coffee
fields.description: For our coffee lovers we have this amazing blend of roasted coffee with Baileys.

fields.name: Banana Caramel
fields.description: A dark banana caramel blended with both milk and dark chocolate. It is a perfect flavour for those Banoffee lovers.
fields.mini_description: Dark banana caramel with milk and dark chocolate

fields.name: Blackcurrant Cheesecake
fields.description: A classic dessert that fits in the palm of your hand. Tangy and creamy, a perfect combination
fields.mini_description: Tangy and creamy, a perfect combination

fields.name: Brownie
fields.description: A milk chocolate ganache with an amazing brownie filling!
fields.mini_description: Milk chocolate ganache with brownie filling

fields.name: Cookie Dough
fields.description: This irresistible cooking snack is now gluten free. I'd wager you couldn't eat just one. Do you accept my challenge?

fields.name: Crunchy Peanut
fields.description: A truly amazing flavour that brings the sweetness of a praline, with a touch of salt. Accompanied by our iconic milk chocolate ganache to balance it out.
fields.mini_description: The sweetness of a praline, with a touch of salt.

fields.name: Horchata
fields.description: Inspired by a traditional Mexican drink that is made up of cinnamon, rice and milk.
fields.mini_description: Inspired by a traditional Mexican drink made up of cinnamon, rice, and milk

fields.name: Key Lime Pie
fields.description: Truly my favourite flavour. An amazing balance between sweet and sour with a thin cookie at the bottom to bring it all together.
fields.mini_description: Sweet and sour with a think cookie base

fields.name: Mango and Passionfruit Caramel
fields.description: The perfect caramel with the perfect consistency. We got it just right.
fields.mini_description: The perfect caramel with the perfect consistency. We got it just right.

fields.name: Maple Crunch
fields.description: A decadent and delicious flavour that bring maple and lotus biscuits together.
fields.mini_description: A decadent and delicious flavour that bring maple and lotus biscuits together.

fields.name: Milk Chocolate Ganache
fields.description: A traditional flavour which offers a creamy and smooth texture to the chocolate. Perfect for chocolate lovers who want to stick to the classics.
fields.mini_description: Traditional flavour with a creamy texture

fields.name: Passionfruit, Blood Orange and Guava
fields.description: This is our only tri-layered chocolate. The combination of the three flavours gives it a truly tropical and refreshing feel.
fields.mini_description: Three flavours for a tropical and refreshing taste

fields.name: Praline Feuilletine
fields.description: One of our most popular flavours. We have mixed feuilletine into the praline to add an extra layer of crunch to the already delicious praline.
fields.mini_description: One of our most popular flavours with crunch!

fields.name: Strawberry and Vanilla
fields.description: One of our double layered bonbons, with the perfect blend of vanilla and strawberries.

fields.name: Tangy mango
fields.description: Try our Mexican inspired tangy mango bonbon. The perfect balance between sweet and sour.

fields.name: Vanilla Pecan
fields.description: This flavour has been in the works for a while. A remarkable sweet and nutty delight.
fields.mini_description: A remarkable sweet and nutty delight.
